Handwashing.sentence: The healthcare worker removes any jewelry from their hands and wrists.
Handwashing.subject: The healthcare worker
Handwashing.object: any jewelry from their hands and wrists

Handwashing.sentence: The healthcare worker turns on the water to a comfortable temperature.
Handwashing.subject: The healthcare worker
Handwashing.object: the water to a comfortable temperature

Handwashing.sentence: The healthcare worker applies soap to their hands.
Handwashing.subject: The healthcare worker

Handwashing.sentence: The healthcare worker rubs their hands together for at least 20 seconds, ensuring to cover all surfaces.
Handwashing.subject: The healthcare worker
Handwashing.object: their hands together for at least 20 seconds

Handwashing.sentence: The healthcare worker rinses their hands thoroughly under clean running water.
Handwashing.subject: The healthcare worker
Handwashing.object: their hands thoroughly under clean running water
